summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET TRAILBLAZER. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS BEING INSPECTED BY AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC, THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE FRONT DRIVER'S SIDE CONTROL ARM WAS SEVERELY CORRODED AND FRACTURED. AS A RESULT, BOTH LOWER CONTROL ARMS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND INFORMED THE CONTACT TO HAVE THE VEHICLE INSPECTED BY A CHEVROLET DEALER. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 60,912.
